issue.title: [C++] Use self-pipe in signal-receiving StopSource
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17859](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17859). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The signal-receiving StopSource currently uses elaborate hacks to request the StopSource from a signal handler. Instead we should just use a SelfPipe and send signals to a worker thread.
